Founded in 2016, Ipipro Inc. is committed to creating high-end electric bikes that change urban mobility under the brand Spacevelo. Our team of engineers and designers developed high-performance bikes with powerful motors, long-lasting batteries, and stylish and lightweight frames. We adhere to the concept of sustainability, use environmentally friendly materials, and use smart technology such as app connectivity, GPS tracking, and anti-theft functions.

After the Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign received support from more than 400 backers, we are expanding globally, fully demonstrating the market demand for innovative electric mobility. Spacevelo is redefining urban cycling - easy, stylish, and sustainable. Join us!
